description: Updates the values of fields on a case. Fields to be updated are received as an array of id/value pairs identical to the CreateCase input . If the action is successful, the service sends back an HTTP 200 response with an empty HTTP body.

parameters.name: caseId
parameters.description: A unique identifier of the case.

parameters.name: domainId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Cases domain.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: An array of objects with fieldId (matching ListFields/DescribeField) and value union data, structured identical to CreateCase. (dict) --- Object for case field values. Unique identifier of a field. Union of potential field value types. booleanValue (boolean) --- Can be either null, or have a Boolean value type. Only one value can be provided. doubleValue (float) --- Can be either null, or have a Double number value type. emptyValue (dict) --- An empty value. stringValue (string) --- String value type. userArnValue (string) --- Represents the user that performed the audit.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: Union of potential field value types.

nested_params.name: booleanValue
nested_params.description: Can be either null, or have a Boolean value type. Only one value can be provided.

nested_params.name: doubleValue
nested_params.description: Can be either null, or have a Double number value type. Only one value can be provided.

nested_params.name: userArnValue
nested_params.description: Represents the user that performed the audit.

parameters.name: performedBy
parameters.description: Represents the entity that performed the action. customEntity (string) --- Any provided entity. userArn (string) --- Represents the Amazon Connect ARN of the user.

nested_params.name: userArn
nested_params.description: Represents the Amazon Connect ARN of the user.
